授業方法: This is a student-initiated seminar course. It is essential that students prepare for oral and written reports on a regular basis in consultation with the instructor.

トピック.授業計画1:
Students will determine and examine particular issues in consultation with the instructor. These could include issues related to the building of a new world order such as comprehensive human security, energy, environment, food problems, and issues related to the globalization of Japanese and other societies in such areas as business, foreign immigrants, internationalization of university education, gender equality and IT.

For details, consult the instructor.
トピック.授業外学習2: Students must spend most of the time in and outside classes on self-initiated research.

評価.成績評価Grading2:
備考　Note
(1) Research Design and Proposal: 10%
(2) In class assignments: 40%
(3) Final Research Essay: 50%
